name: py-logging
description: Javascript logging library based on the Python logging module

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run version-check
scripts.doc: jsdoc2md core/logging.js core/Filterer.js core/Logger.js core/Handler.js core/Formatter.js core/Filter.js core/Manager.js core/handlers.js commonkit/index.js nodekit/index.js > API.md

author: jose-pleonasm
